description.value:
You can save your shield from total destruction, even after a devastating attack. If a shield would be destroyed due to damage taken during your @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Shield Block]{Shield Block}, the shield remains intact at 1 Hit Point instead.

Its construction is weakened until you take the time to repair it, preventing you from using Shield Salvation to save the same shield until your next preparations.
